author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Check out courses in science, computer science, and mathematics on Brilliant! Start learning for free at https://brilliant.org/sabine/ and get 20% off a premium subscription, which includes daily unlimited access!

A physicist from Japan claims that he has found the first direct evidence for dark matter in very highly energetic gamma-ray emissions from the centre of our galaxy. Let’s have a look at the paper.

Paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.07209v2

title: Scientists may have detected dark matter.
